name: Unleash Protocol
extra_attack_method: Privilege compromise View Reference Sources 2025-12-29 Hacked target: MSCST Description of the event: On the BSC network, an unknown smart contract MSCST suffered a flash loan attack, resulting in an estimated loss of approximately $130,000. The root cause of the exploit lies in the lack of access control (ACL) within the releaseReward() function of the MSCST contract, which allowed the attacker to manipulate the price of the GPC token in the PancakeSwap liquidity pool (address: 0x12da).
